Nationwide school phone ban comes into force tomorrow. Will smart watches provide a loophole? https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nationwide-school-phone-ban-comes-into-force-today-will-smart-watches-provide-a-loophole/2JHIGYXZH5A6PJGMPRDM4OMJJE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nationwide-school-phone-ban-comes-into-force-today-will-smart-watches-provide-a-loophole/2JHIGYXZH5A6PJGMPRDM4OMJJE/ Natasha GordonFrom tomorrow, cellphone use will be banned in schools for students across the country. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 08:06:53 +0000 The Government’s nationwide ban of the use of cellphones in schools is set to come into effect from tomorrow. Photo / 123rf
Plea for safety following deaths of two children on rural South Auckland driveways in four days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/plea-for-safety-following-deaths-of-two-children-on-rural-south-auckland-driveways-in-four-days/EJ2KDXZUJJF2PFWJYV3CVCRSX4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/plea-for-safety-following-deaths-of-two-children-on-rural-south-auckland-driveways-in-four-days/EJ2KDXZUJJF2PFWJYV3CVCRSX4/ Benjamin PlummerIt is understood that both children were under the age of 4. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 07:55:52 +0000 Police said in both incidents the children died at the scene.
Scam victim Borja Ares disappointed after Banking Ombudsman rejects full BNZ payout for $330k loss https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/scam-victim-borja-ares-disappointed-after-banking-ombudsman-rejects-full-bnz-payout-for-330k-loss/KWRHJCXA6NCE3N7AL3DUZV675U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/scam-victim-borja-ares-disappointed-after-banking-ombudsman-rejects-full-bnz-payout-for-330k-loss/KWRHJCXA6NCE3N7AL3DUZV675U/ Natasha GordonThe pair accused BNZ of missing crucial 'red flags' regarding a known scam. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 07:39:33 +0000 Scam victims Borja Ares and Alfiya Laxmidhar and Carla O'Neil. Image / NZME
Police hunting armed robbers who stormed Michael Hill Jeweller store in dramatic West Auckland smash-and-grab https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-aggravated-robbery-at-west-auckland-mall/L534V5VCPZACRMVXW4AM4AYIXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/emergency-services-responding-to-aggravated-robbery-at-west-auckland-mall/L534V5VCPZACRMVXW4AM4AYIXU/ Customers barricaded themselves inside stores while others ran from the mall in panic. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 06:57:30 +0000 Police at Westgate's Northwest Shopping Centre in Massey after armed robbers raided the Michael Hill Jeweller store. Photo / Alex Burton
Stricken boatie winched to safety after vessel capsizes on notorious Manukau bar https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/stricken-boatie-winched-to-safety-after-vessel-capsizes-on-notorious-manukau-bar/OJWKRVRSJJEIJMICFLURT7N2AU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/stricken-boatie-winched-to-safety-after-vessel-capsizes-on-notorious-manukau-bar/OJWKRVRSJJEIJMICFLURT7N2AU/ Another boatie was rescued by a passing jet ski. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 06:24:44 +0000 The Waiuku Coastguard rescue vessel was involved in a dramatic rescue today of two boaties whose vessel capsized while crossing the Manukau bar.
Auckland woman’s car written off after she swerves to avoid hay bale on Northwestern motorway https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-womans-car-writing-off-after-she-swerves-to-avoid-hay-bale-on-northwestern-motorway/ECXYHLYPXBF6PMQO7Q7VEU4C7M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-womans-car-writing-off-after-she-swerves-to-avoid-hay-bale-on-northwestern-motorway/ECXYHLYPXBF6PMQO7Q7VEU4C7M/ She lost her job after the accident because she could no longer drive. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 05:30:03 +0000 Katie Stolpmann's car was written off after she was forced to swerve across three lanes to avoid a rogue hay bale on Auckland's State Highway 18.
Thousands line Whanganui River for Lanterns on the Awa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/thousands-line-whanganui-river-for-lanterns-on-the-awa/NMSRUMYNO5GJHL54ZEZBYLHN34/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/whanganui-chronicle/news/thousands-line-whanganui-river-for-lanterns-on-the-awa/NMSRUMYNO5GJHL54ZEZBYLHN34/ Zaryd WilsonIt's the Year of the Dragon. Cyclone Gabrielle: Story behind memorable cyclone photograph of upside-down Esk Valley car https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cyclone-gabrielle-story-behind-memorable-cyclone-photograph-of-upside-down-esk-valley-car/U2NHNGAHUBFP5MFNG5D22JVYP4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/cyclone-gabrielle-story-behind-memorable-cyclone-photograph-of-upside-down-esk-valley-car/U2NHNGAHUBFP5MFNG5D22JVYP4/ Gary Hamilton-IrvineThe powerful image ran on the front of Hawke's Bay Today and the Herald after the flood. Sun, 28 Apr 2024 04:36:59 +0000 Katrina Harris at the site in Eskdale where her car crashed through a house in the floods, which became a powerful image from the cyclone. She is pictured in her new vehicle. Photo / Paul Taylor
